text: Michael Rummenigge (born February 3, 1964) is a former German football player. He has played for the German national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== :Source: Club Season League Cup League Cup Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bayern Munich 1982–83 Bundesliga 1 0 1 0 1983–84 33 11 33 11 1984–85 24 5 24 5 1985–86 31 10 31 10 1986–87 31 8 31 8 1987–88 32 10 32 10 Total 152 44 152 44 Borussia Dortmund 1988–89 Bundesliga 32 4 32 4 1989–90 29 9 29 9 1990–91 31 8 31 8 1991–92 36 10 36 10 1992–93 26 4 26 4 1993–94 3 1 3 1 Total 157 36 157 36 Urawa Reds 1993 J1 League 6 1 2 0 3 3 11 4 1994 27 11 0 0 2 1 29 12 1995 9 1 0 0 - 9 1 Total 42 13 2 0 5 4 49 17 Career total 351 93 2 0 5 4 358 97 ===International=== Germany national team Year Apps Goals 1983 1 0 1984 0 0 1985 0 0 1986 1 0 Total 2 0 ==Honours== Bayern Munich * Bundesliga: 1984–85, 1985–86, 1986–87 * DFB-Pokal: 1983–84, 1985–86 * DFL-Supercup: 1987 * European Cup: runner-up 1986–87 Borussia Dortmund * DFB- Pokal: 1988–89 * DFL-Supercup: 1989 * UEFA Cup: runner-up 1992–93 ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from North Rhine-Westphalia
